import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { post, getTemperament, filterByCreated } from './../../redux/actions/index'; rf /* export default function Create() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const history = useHistory(); const temperamet = useSelector((state) => state.temperament); const [input, setInput] = useState({ name: '', minHeight: '', maxHeight: '', minWeight: '', maxWeight: '', minLifeExp: '', maxLifeExp: '', img: '', temperament: [], }) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getTemperament()); }, [dispatch]) function handleChange(e) { setInput({ ...input, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }) } function handleSelect(e) { setInput({ ...input, temperament: [...input.temperament, e.target.value], }) } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); console.log(input); dispatch(post(input)); setInput({ name: '', minHeight: '', maxHeight: '', minWeight: '', maxWeight: '', minLifeExp: '', maxLifeExp: '', img: '', temperament: [], }) alert('New dog breed Saved'); history.push('/home'); } return (

add the details for the new breed!
